p: After validation, the Maxent models were used to project the changes in species distribution under RCP2.6 and RCP8.5 scenarios for 2050 and 2070 (AR5 report) [ 61] provided by the WorldClim-Global Climate Data facility ( http://www.worldclim.org/). Scenario RCP2.6 is representative of mitigation policy aiming to limit the increase of global mean temperature to 2Â°C. Scenario RCP8.5 does not include any mitigation target [ 62]. We used two independent global circulation models (MIROC5 and CCSM4) suitable for the study area to predict the changes. To obtain a straightforward view of the species distribution in the future, we also averaged all predicted trends for scenarios, models and time periods (2050 and 2070).
